entities.name: Q4 2025 Job Search Analytics Dashboard
entities.description: Comprehensive performance analytics for job search activities from September-October 2025

collections.name: Funnel Metrics
collections.description: Application funnel conversion rates and stage performance

items.name: Overall Funnel Performance
items.description: End-to-end application funnel metrics

items.name: Company Size Funnel Analysis
items.description: Funnel performance segmented by company size

properties.insight: Mid-size companies show best offer conversion despite lower screen rates

items.name: Role Type Funnel Analysis
items.description: Conversion rates by role specialization

properties.frontend_advantage: 2x better offer rate than other roles
properties.recommendation: Focus 70% of applications on frontend specialist roles

items.name: Application Method Funnel
items.description: Success rates by application channel

properties.referral_offer_advantage: Only channel with offers to date

items.name: Remote vs Onsite Funnel
items.description: Performance comparison for work location types

collections.name: Application Performance Metrics
collections.description: Success rates and performance benchmarks for applications

items.name: Resume Success Rate by Version
items.description: Performance tracking for different resume iterations

properties.recommendation: Return to v3.2 format, incorporate data engineering keywords from v4.1

items.name: Cover Letter Impact Analysis
items.description: Correlation between cover letter personalization and success

properties.personalization_value: 76% higher screen rate for highly personalized

items.name: Technical Skills Keyword Optimization
items.description: Success rate correlation with skill keywords

items.name: Salary Expectation Impact
items.description: How stated salary expectations affect screening rates

properties.optimal_strategy: State market rate (150-170k) for best screen rate
properties.no_salary_paradox: Slightly lower than market rate disclosure
properties.negotiation_recommendation: State market rate, negotiate 15-20% higher at offer stage

items.name: Portfolio Presentation Impact
items.description: Correlation between portfolio quality and interview rates

properties.demo_advantage: 3.75x better interview rate vs no portfolio

items.name: Response Time Correlation
items.description: Impact of application response speed on outcomes

properties.automation_opportunity: Set up job posting alerts for instant notification

collections.name: Time Analysis Metrics
collections.description: Timeline and duration analytics for application processes

items.name: Average Response Times by Company Type
items.description: Time to first response segmented by company characteristics

properties.expectation_setting: Enterprise: plan for 2+ week initial response
properties.follow_up_recommendation: Startups: 3 days, Tech: 7 days, Enterprise: 14 days

items.name: Interview Stage Duration Analysis
items.description: Time spent in each interview stage

items.name: Time Investment per Application
items.description: Hours spent on application materials and preparation

properties.roi_calculation: Each extra hour invested = 18% higher screen rate

items.name: Interview Preparation Time Analysis
items.description: Preparation hours vs interview performance

properties.technical_prep_roi: Highest time investment, critical for success
properties.over_prep_warning: Diminishing returns after 15 hours for technical
properties.prep_efficiency_tip: Reuse 70% of prep materials across similar roles

items.name: Weekly Activity Summary
items.description: Week-by-week application and interview activity

items.name: Day of Week Performance
items.description: Success rates by application submission day

properties.friday_effect: 20% lower response rate, applications get buried

items.name: Industry Benchmark Comparison
items.description: Personal performance vs industry averages

properties.gap_to_elite: Need 4% higher overall conversion to reach top 10%

items.name: A/B Test Results - Approach Comparison
items.description: Controlled tests of different job search strategies

properties.salary_timing_insight: Wait until late stage for 67% better negotiation

items.name: Geographic Market Performance
items.description: Success rates by location and market

properties.best_roi_market: San Francisco Bay - highest salary and screen rate

items.name: Interview Performance Benchmarks
items.description: Interview success metrics and improvement tracking

properties.improvement_area: Onsite behavioral - need more STAR examples
properties.feedback_themes: Strong technical skills, improve executive presence

items.name: Offer Negotiation Benchmarks
items.description: Negotiation outcomes and leverage analysis

items.name: Skills Gap Analysis
items.description: Most requested skills vs current capabilities

properties.recommended_training: 2 weeks K8s bootcamp could open 18 additional opportunities
properties.skill_saturation: React/TypeScript well covered, focus on infrastructure

items.name: Rejection Analysis & Learning
items.description: Common rejection reasons and improvement opportunities

properties.key_improvement: Add 2-3 leadership/mentoring examples to address 28% of rejections
properties.technical_gaps: System design depth mentioned in 5 rejections
properties.positive_trend: Technical assessment pass rate improving monthly

items.name: LinkedIn Optimization Experiment
items.description: Testing different LinkedIn profile optimizations

headline_test_week.change: Added specific tech stack to headline

properties.hypothesis: Video intro will increase recruiter messages by 30%

items.name: Cold Outreach Effectiveness Test
items.description: Testing different outreach strategies to hiring managers

properties.key_insight: Engaging with content first increases response 3x

items.name: Application Timing Optimization
items.description: Finding optimal times for application submission

properties.best_window: 6-9am local time - catch recruiters starting their day
properties.hypothesis_validation: Confirmed - early submissions get priority review

items.name: Technical Blog Impact Tracking
items.description: Measuring impact of technical content creation

items.name: Salary Transparency Experiment
items.description: Impact of disclosing salary expectations at different stages

properties.key_finding: Later disclosure = better offers (12% above expectation)
properties.trade_off: Early disclosure filters mismatches but caps upside
properties.optimal_strategy: General range in phone screen, specific in final stage
properties.counter_intuitive: Phone screen disclosure has highest offer rate
properties.sample_size_note: Need 20 more data points for statistical significance

items.name: Follow-up Cadence Experiment
items.description: Testing different follow-up timing strategies

properties.diminishing_returns: Third follow-up adds minimal value, risks annoyance
properties.best_practice: Value-add follow-ups (share article, update skills) vs generic
properties.recommendation: 2 follow-ups maximum, with new information each time
